summary: Provides a high‑level entry point to the parsing library, encapsulating the creation of lexer and parser components from an EBNF grammar and exposing operations to process input text, generate parse trees, and interactively explore parsing steps.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly define a grammar and obtain a ready‑to‑use parser without dealing with low‑level construction details, supporting grammar loading, configuration handling, tokenization, parsing, interactive debugging, and persistence of parser settings.
